name: Ava's Cash
summary: Official Governance Token of Ava's DAO
description: Ava's DAO is a non-profit organization on a mission to build and manage a comprehensive suite of products & services for maximizing the utility and availability of financial instruments to every man, woman and child in the world.
legal: Every AVAS holder is permitted to vote on-chain for public proposals. 'Qualified' AVAS holders receive Daily Payouts to their Nexa address from revenues deposited into Ava's Treasury.
